title: 5 Cool Gadgets to Kick off 2019
description: Jonathan Morrison here, taking a look at the larger-than-life, but compact and portable LG gram 17 Ultra-Lightweight Laptopand it is freaking tasty! Its the worlds lightest 17-inch laptop, weighing in at less than 3lbs., and inside is an 8th Gen Intel Core processor (i7), dual channel memory/dual channel SSD slots, 16GB RAM, 1 terabyte of M.2 solid state storage, Windows 10, a heavy-duty 72Wh battery for tons of power, not to mention an array of ports for easy multi-tasking, and amazing sound via the built-in DTS Headphone: X. But thats just the beginning. Learn more about the LG gram here:      More cool tech -   Charged Cassette Tape Power Bank:  Logitech G903 Wireless Gaming Mouse (sorry Dave2D)  Powerplay Wireless Charging Mat:  Razer USB-C Earbuds -  Blue Yeticaster Bundle:    TLD Behind the Scenes!  Mobile users:   Music via Musicbed:   My Audio Setup & Gear:   Instagram:
